required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in the Treatment of Relapsed Ovarian Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-label, Single-arm, Phase Ib Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in Subjects With Platinum-Resistant or Platinum-Refractory Relapsed Ovarian Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicenter, open-label, single-arm, phase Ib study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in subjects with Platinum-Resistant or Platinum-Refractory Relapsed Ovarian Cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multicenter, open-label, single-arm, phase Ib study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in subjects with Platinum-Resistant or Platinum-Refractory Relapsed Ovarian Cancer. At least 30 subjects will be recruited in this study. The subjects will receive Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome 20 mg/m2 by an intravenous infusion (IV), every 21 days (q3w, 1 cycle). All patients will receive the treatment until disease progression, intolerable toxic reaction, death, or withdrawal by investigator or patient decision (a maximum of 8 cycles). Delays in drug administration is allowed from the cycle 2, however, the delays should be no more than 3 weeks. Dose adjustments after the cycle 2 is permitted, and the minimum dose is 12mg/m2.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the initiation of the first dose to 28 days after the last dose，assessed up to 36 months
primary_outcome.description: The incidence and severity of AEs, abnormalities in physical exams, vital sign assessments, clinical laboratory assessments, ultrasonic cardiograms (UCGs) and electrocardiographs (ECGs).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to the final documentation of response of the last subject (assessed up to 36 months)
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to death, lost to follow-up, withdrawal, or study end, whichever occurred first, assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to death, lost to follow-up, withdrawal, or study end, whichever occurred first, assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to death, lost to follow-up, withdrawal, or study end, whichever occurred first, assessed up to 36 months
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the enrollment to the death of last subject or the end of the clinical trial (assessed up to 36 months)
secondary_outcome.description: To investigate the preliminary antitumor efficacy

arm_group.description: Subjects with Platinum-Resistant or Platinum-Refractory Relapsed Ovarian Cancer will receive 20 mg/m2 Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome every 21 days (a cycle) for a maximum of 8 cycles.

intervention.description: All subjects will receive Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome 20 mg/m2, IV, on day 1 of each 21-day cycle (q3w).

facility.name: Union Hospital affiliated to Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology
